name: Publicly Accessible Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Servers
query: { postgreSqlFlexibleServers( where: { publicAccessBlocked: false firewallRules_SOME: { startIPAddress: "0.0.0.0" endIPAddress: "255.255.255.255" } } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
